main_definition: Wow is an exclamation expressing surprise, admiration, or astonishment.

meanings_and_examples.example: When I saw the Grand Canyon for the first time, I just said 'Wow!'
'Wow!' exclaimed Sarah when she found a $20 bill on the ground.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to show appreciation for someone's effort or achievement
meanings_and_examples.example: 'You did such an amazing job on this project! Wow, I am impressed!' said her boss.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Can be used casually to indicate something has caught one's attention
meanings_and_examples.example: 'Wow, that new song is really catchy.'
